mapper.select: SELECT qno, qtitle, qcontent, answercheck, secretcheck, filename, filesize, qwriter,TO_CHAR(qregdate,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as dbday FROM(SELECT qno, qtitle, qcontent, answercheck, secretcheck, filename, filesize, qwriter,qregdate,rownum as num FROM (SELECT qno, qtitle, qcontent, answercheck, secretcheck, filename, filesize, qwriter,qregdate FROM QNABOARD ORDER BY qno DESC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/10.0) FROM QNABOARD WHERE qtype=2
